en.title: Cookie Manager - UPlanet MULTIPASS
en.hero_subtitle: Share Your Authenticated Sessions With Your UPlanet AI
en.auth_subtitle: Connect your MULTIPASS to upload cookies
en.auth_error_extension: NOSTR extension not found. Install nos2x, Alby, or compatible extension.
en.what_cookies_intro: A cookie file contains your authentication session for a website. By sharing it with your UPlanet AI:
en.what_cookies_youtube_desc: Auto-sync your likes üëç, download your favorites
en.what_cookies_leboncoin_desc: Search ads with your personal filters
en.what_cookies_any_desc: Let your AI access content as you
en.what_cookies_security_desc: Cookies are stored in your private MULTIPASS. Only you and your AI can access them.
en.step1_info: üí° This extension exports cookies in the standard Netscape format, compatible with automation tools.
en.step2_why_desc: To prevent the website from invalidating your cookies after export. The private session stays isolated from your normal browsing.
en.step3_3: Browse normally (watch a video, view listings...)
en.step3_tip: üí° Tip: The more you browse, the more complete and effective your cookies will be.
en.step4_1: Click the "Get cookies.txt LOCALLY" extension icon
en.step4_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Close the private window now and don't use it anymore. You can continue using the site normally in your regular browser.
en.step5_content: Scroll back to the top and drop the cookies.txt file in the upload zone.
en.step5_auto: ‚úÖ Automatic: The system will detect the domain and securely store your cookies in your MULTIPASS.
en.faq_a1: Yes! Your cookies are stored in your personal MULTIPASS, encrypted and accessible only by you and your AI. No one else can access them.
en.faq_q2: How long do cookies stay valid?
en.faq_a2: Generally between 2 weeks and 6 months depending on the website. If your cookies expire, just re-export and re-upload a new file.
en.faq_q3: Can I upload cookies from multiple sites?
en.faq_a3: Yes! You can export and upload cookies from each site separately. The system will automatically detect the domain and store them correctly.
en.faq_q4: Will my normal browsing be affected?
en.faq_a4: No! Exporting in a private window ensures your normal session isn't disrupted. You can continue using sites normally.
en.faq_q5: What does my AI do with my cookies?
en.faq_a5_title: Your AI uses your cookies to:
en.faq_a5_youtube: YouTube: Sync your likes, download your favorite videos
en.faq_a5_other: Other sites: Access content as if it were you
